user_prompt: create epics and user stories for the usecase

epics.title: Project Setup and Architecture Design
epics.summary: Establish the foundational architecture for the project.
epics.description: This epic covers setting up the project's foundational environment and architecture, including selecting the tech stack, defining infrastructure, establishing CI/CD pipelines, configuring environments, and setting coding standards. It ensures the team has a scalable, reliable, and maintainable base on which all other features can be built.

epics.title: User Authentication and Authorization
epics.summary: Implement user registration, login, and role management.
epics.description: This epic focuses on creating a secure user authentication and authorization module. It includes features for user registration, login, password management, token handling, and role-based access control. The goal is to ensure user data privacy and controlled access to resources.

epics.title: Core Feature Development
epics.summary: Develop the main functional components of the application.
epics.description: This epic involves building the primary features that form the core purpose of the project. It includes designing and developing modules, implementing business logic, integrating services, and ensuring end-to-end functionality that delivers the main value proposition of the application.

epics.title: User Interface and Experience
epics.summary: Design and implement an intuitive and user-friendly interface.
epics.description: This epic focuses on the visual and interactive elements of the project. It covers creating responsive designs, ensuring accessibility, establishing consistent UI patterns, improving usability, and performing user testing to optimize the overall user experience.

epics.title: Advanced Features and Integrations
epics.summary: Incorporate advanced functionalities and external integrations.
epics.description: This epic adds advanced capabilities and integrates third-party systems as needed by the business or users. Examples include analytics dashboards, social media integration, notifications, payment gateways, or any other integration that enhances the application's value and competitiveness.

epics.title: Testing, Optimization, and Deployment
epics.summary: Ensure the product is tested, optimized, and ready for deployment.
epics.description: This epic includes quality assurance, performance optimization, bug fixes, and deployment preparation. It ensures that all product features have been tested thoroughly, the system performs optimally under expected loads, and a stable release is deployed to production successfully.

user_stories.title: Select tech stack for the project
user_stories.description: As a software architect, I want to select the tech stack, so that the project's foundational environment is suitable for future development.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The selected tech stack is documented and agreed upon by the team.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the tech stack choice, when reviewed by stakeholders, then it is approved.

user_stories.title: Define infrastructure for the project
user_stories.description: As a devops engineer, I want to define the infrastructure, so that the project has a scalable and reliable environment.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The infrastructure setup is documented and ready for provisioning.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the infrastructure setup, when applied to the environment, then it provisions correctly.

user_stories.title: Establish CI/CD pipelines
user_stories.description: As a devops engineer, I want to establish CI/CD pipelines, so that the deployment process is automated and efficient.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Pipelines should support continuous integration and delivery
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: CI/CD pipelines are fully functional and tested.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a new feature branch, when changes are pushed, then CI/CD pipelines are triggered automatically.

user_stories.title: Implement user registration
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to register, so that I can create an account on the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Capture basic user information like name, email, and password
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can register with valid information.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a registration form, when filled with valid data, then the user is successfully registered.

user_stories.title: Implement user login
user_stories.description: As a user, I want to be able to log in, so that I can access my account on the platform.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Authenticate users using email and password
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users can log in with valid credentials.
user_stories.test_cases: Given login credentials, when entered correctly, then access is granted.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access control
user_stories.description: As an admin, I want to manage user roles, so that users have appropriate access to resources.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Roles can be assigned and managed effectively.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user role, when assigned to a user, then the user has corresponding access permissions.

user_stories.title: Design and develop core modules
user_stories.description: As a product owner, I want the core modules to be developed, so that the main functionality of the application is implemented.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Ensure modules align with business requirements
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Core modules are designed and developed successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a core module requirement, when development is completed, then it meets the specified requirements.

user_stories.title: Implement business logic
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to implement business logic, so that the application processes data accurately.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Business logic must be robust and adhere to requirements
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Business logic is implemented and tested successfully.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a business requirement, when the logic is implemented, then it processes data as expected.

user_stories.title: Design and implement responsive UI
user_stories.description: As a UI/UX designer, I want to create a responsive UI, so that the application is user-friendly across different devices.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The UI is responsive and passes usability tests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the UI design, when viewed on different devices, then it adapts correctly.

user_stories.title: Ensure UI accessibility
user_stories.description: As a developer, I want to ensure UI accessibility, so that all users, including those with disabilities, can use the application.
user_stories.test_cases: Given the UI, when accessed by users with disabilities, then it remains usable.
